story_06_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Keep it up, everyone!
We’re almost to the training ground!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I wonder what sort of training Korrina
is gonna have us do...
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hey there, Korrina!
You’ve gathered quite the crowd today.
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Oh! Hi, Brendan!
I didn’t know you’d be here today!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Everyone, this is my friend Brendan!
Brendan, everyone!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Nice to meet you. Name’s Brendan.
I’m a Pokémon Trainer from the Hoenn region.
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
So, if all of you are here with Korrina,
that must mean...
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yep! We’re about to do some training together!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Nice! Do you mind if I join you?
I’ve been wanting to do some training myself!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Haha, I should have known.
Of course you can, Brendan!
story_06_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go!
Everyone’s waiting for us just up ahead!
